Description

Status Register

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:20] reserved5 r 0x0 reserved5

Field Descriptions

reserved5 - reserved5

Reserved field

TX_LVL - TX_LVL

Fill level of the TX FIFO.

reserved4 - reserved4

Reserved field

RX_LVL - RX_LVL

Fill level of the RX FIFO

CNT_DROP - CNT_DROP

Number of unaligned accesses, which are dropped.
